ing.item: BY 24-INCH ROASTING PAN TEMPERATURE: 350 F. OVEN

directions.step:
1. COMBINE SAUERKRAUT AND WATER. HEAT TO SIMMER. DRAIN OFF EXCESS LIQUID.
2. PLACE 1 1/2 GAL SAUERKRAUT IN EACH PAN. ARRANGE KNOCKWURST ON TOP OF SAUERKRAUT IN EACH PAN.
3. BAKE 35 TO 40 MINUTES OR UNTIL WELL HEATED.
NOTE: 1. SAUERKRAUT AND KNOCKWURST MAY BE LAYERED. PLACE 3/4 GAL SAUER- KRAUT IN EACH PAN, ARRANGE KNOCKWURST ON TOP; COVER WITH REMAINING SAUER- KRAUT.
2. OTHER SIZES AND TYPES OF PANS MAY BE USED. SEE RECIPE NO. A-25.
Recipe Number: L11301
SERVING SIZE: 1 KNOCKWUR
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
